browser_narrative.strategic_approach: Parsimonious Industrial Policy Approach - Limited opportunities requires addressing bottlenecks, to help jump short distances, into related products.
browser_narrative.high_potential_sectors: Industrial Machinery and Electrical machinery and equipment
browser_narrative.structural_transformation: Portugal has completed the process of structural transformation, having entered all major, high-productivity sectors.
browser_narrative.new_products: 16 new products since 2009, contributed $144 in income per capita
